character.name: Dracula
description: A so-called "last living human". His cards often <c=downside>self-hurt</c>, but they also often <c=heal>heal</c>.

ship.name: Batmobile
ship.description: Dracula's new ride. A bit fragile but can stock and recover hull points with ease.

droneTrigger.name: Drone Trigger
droneTrigger.description: <c=midrow>Drones</c> and <c=midrow>missiles</c> in front of your missile bays instantly take a turn.

m&k: This card has three separate sets of actions.
In combat, <c=keyword>right click or ctrl-click</c> this card to switch between them.
controller: This card has three separate sets of actions.
In combat, press {{Button}} on this card to switch between them.

m&k: This card has four separate sets of actions.
In combat, <c=keyword>right click or ctrl-click</c> this card to switch between them.
controller: This card has four separate sets of actions.
In combat, press {{Button}} on this card to switch between them.

m&k: This card has an optional set of actions.
In combat, <c=keyword>right click or ctrl-click</c> this card to toggle it off or on.
controller: This card has an optional set of actions.
In combat, press {{Button}} on this card to toggle it off or on.

Bleeding.name: Bleeding
Bleeding.description: At the end of turn, <c=downside>take 1 damage</c> and decrease this by 1.

BloodMirror.name: Blood Mirror
BloodMirror.description: Whenever you take hull damage, your enemy takes double as much. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 at the start of each turn.</c>

Transfusion.name: Transfusion
Transfusion.description: At the start of turn, gain 1 <c=status>TRANSFUSING</c>. <c=downside>Decrease by 1 for each hull damage taken.</c>

Transfusing.name: Transfusing
Transfusing.description: When <c=status>TRANSFUSING</c> reaches the amount of <c=status>TRANSFUSION</c> on this ship, <c=heal>heal for that amount</c> and remove both.
descriptionLong: When <c=status>TRANSFUSING</c> reaches the amount of <c=status>TRANSFUSION</c> on this ship, <c=heal>heal for that amount</c> and remove both.
If you still have <c=status>TRANSFUSING</c> at the end of combat, <c=heal>heal for its amount</c>.

below.stateless: you are at or below half hull
below.stateful: you are at or below half (<c=boldPink>{{Hull}}</c>) hull

Normal.name: Bat
Normal.description: Applies 1 <c=status>BLEEDING</c> to a ship in front of it, or to the owner. If the enemy was hit, the owner gains 1 <c=status>TRANSFUSION</c>.

Bloodthirsty.name: Bloodthirsty Bat
Bloodthirsty.description: Deals 1 damage and applies 1 <c=status>BLEEDING</c> to a ship in front of it, or to the owner. If the enemy was hit, <c=heal>the owner gets healed</c> for 1 and gains 1 <c=status>TRANSFUSION</c>.

Protective.name: Protective Bat
Protective.description: Applies 1 <c=status>BLEEDING</c> to a ship in front of it, or to the owner. If the enemy was hit, the bat gains <c=midrow>BUBBLE</c>, or if it already has one, the owner gains 1 <c=status>TRANSFUSION</c>.

Batmobile.name: BATMOBILE
description: Gain 1 <c=status>MAX SHIELD</c> while at or below 75% hull.
Gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c> and <c=status>SHIELD</c> upon dropping to or below 50% hull.
Remove <c=parttrait>WEAK</c> from your ship's wings while at or below 25% hull.
All attacks deal 1 extra damage while at 1 hull.
combatDescription: Gain 1 <c=status>MAX SHIELD</c> while at or below 75% (<c=boldPink>{{Hull75}}</c>) hull.
Gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c> and <c=status>SHIELD</c> upon dropping to or below 50% (<c=boldPink>{{Hull50}}</c>) hull.
Remove <c=parttrait>WEAK</c> from your ship's wings while at or below 25% (<c=boldPink>{{Hull25}}</c>) hull.
All attacks deal 1 extra damage while at 1 hull.

BloodBank.name: BLOOD BANK
description: Whenever you don't have a <c=card>Bat Debit Card</c> in your hand, gain one.
Whenever you <c=heal>heal any amount of hull</c>, add 1 <c=status>blood</c> to the <c=artifact>Blood Bank</c>.
healBoosterRestrictionDescription: <c=downside><c=artifact>Heal Booster</c> now only triggers once per turn.</c>

ABType.name: AB TYPE
description: Gain 1 extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn if you are at max hull.

OType.name: O TYPE
description: At the start of combat, the <c=artifact>Blood Bank</c> recharges up to 3 charges.

description.stateless: Every odd turn gain <c=status>BLOOD MIRROR</c>. Every even turn your enemy gains <c=status>BLOOD MIRROR</c>.
description.even: Every odd turn gain <c=status>BLOOD MIRROR</c>. Every even turn (like this one) your enemy gains <c=status>BLOOD MIRROR</c>.
description.odd: Every odd turn (like this one) gain <c=status>BLOOD MIRROR</c>. Every even turn your enemy gains <c=status>BLOOD MIRROR</c>.

Masochism.name: MASOCHISM
Masochism.description: Every 5 hull lost during your turn, add a <c=cardtrait>discounted, temporary</c> <c=card>Blood Tap</c> with <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c> to your hand.

Purgatory.name: PURGATORY
Purgatory.description: Whenever you are about to receive fatal damage, gain 1 <c=status>PERFECT SHIELD</c>. Can only trigger once per combat.

TheCount.name: THE COUNT
TheCount.description: After you play a 1-cost, then 2-cost, then 3-cost card in a row, <c=action>TOTAL STUN</c> the enemy, then <c=action>END TURN</c>. Can only trigger once per combat.

WingsOfNight.name: WINGS OF NIGHT
WingsOfNight.description: Every turn add a <c=cardtrait>temporary</c> <c=card>Bat Form A</c> with <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c> to your hand and <c=downside>lose 1 <c=status>EVADE</c></c>.

DraculaBooks.name: BLOODSHARD
DraculaBooks.description: Once per combat, whenever you spend your last <c=status>SHARD</c>, <c=heal>heal {{HealAmount}}</c>.

description.None: Choose a status you have or had. Gain it <c=downside>for a hull price</c>.
description.A: Choose a status you have or had. Gain it <c=downside>for a hull price</c>.
description.B: Choose a status you or the enemy have or had. Gain it <c=downside>for a hull price</c>.

description.None: All your ship parts <c=action>attack</c> for {{Damage}} and <c=action>stun</c>.
description.A: All your ship parts <c=action>attack</c> for {{Damage}} and <c=action>stun</c>.
description.B: All your ship parts <c=action>attack</c> for {{Damage}} and <c=action>stun</c>. <c=heal>Heal</c> for damage done.

description.None: Align your cannon with the closest <c=parttrait>weak</c> part.
description.A: Align your cannon with the closest <c=parttrait>weak</c> part.
description.B: Align your cannon with the closest <c=parttrait>weak</c> part. Move back on turn end.

description.None: All your ship parts get <c=parttrait>armor</c> until the start of the next turn.
description.A: All your ship parts get <c=parttrait>armor</c> until the start of the next turn.
description.B: ALL ship parts get <c=parttrait>armor</c> until the start of the next turn.

description.None: Choose 1 of {{Count}} Spell cards to add to your hand.
description.A: Choose 1 of {{Count}} Spell cards to add to your hand.
description.B: Add {{Count}} different random Spell cards to your hand.

description.None: <c=cardtrait>Exhaust</c> card in hand. Play an <c=cardtrait>exhausted</c> card.
description.B: <c=cardtrait>Exhaust</c> card in hand. Add a <c=cardtrait>card removed from play</c> to hand.

removedFromPlay.name: Card removed from play
removedFromPlay.description: <c=cardtrait>Exhausted</c> and played <c=cardtrait>single use</c> cards are considered removed from play.

ui.exhaustOrSingleUse: Exhaust Pile and Single Use: {{Count}} Cards
ui.handDrawDiscard: Hand, Draw and Discard Piles: {{Count}} Cards

description.None: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=E81B16>Dracula</c> cards to your hand.
description.A: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=E81B16>Dracula</c> cards to your hand.
description.B: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=E81B16>Dracula</c> cards to your hand.
